body:
>  1. people contributing patches know exactly who to add as reviewer.
>  2. gopherbot can automatically add /cc to a triaged issue.

As a counterproposal, I think we can achieve these benefits with an automated scheme that uses something like `git blame` to find the relevant maintainers of a particular piece of code. It would need some smarts to recognize tree-wide changes, but I think it could be done quite easily (perhaps such a tool already exists?).
